TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpListener extends System.Object

summary.span: 侦听来自 TCP 网络客户端的连接。

span.span: Listens for connections from TCP network clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了简单的方法，用于侦听和接受传入连接请求在阻止同步模式。The class provides simple methods that listen for and accept incoming connection requests in blocking synchronous mode. 你可以使用或与连接。You can use either a or a to connect with a . 创建使用，本地 IP 地址和端口号或只是一个端口号。Create a using an , a Local IP address and port number, or just a port number. 指定本地 IP 地址和本地端口号，如果你想要将这些值分配为你的基础服务提供程序为 0。Specify for the local IP address and 0 for the local port number if you want the underlying service provider to assign those values for you. 如果你选择这样做，则可以使用属性标识的已分配的信息之后套接字连接。If you choose to do this, you can use the property to identify the assigned information, after the socket has connected. 使用方法以开始侦听传入连接请求。Use the method to begin listening for incoming connection requests. 将排队等待传入连接，直到您调用方法或它已排队。 will queue incoming connections until you either call the method or it has queued . 可以使用两种或拉取从传入的连接请求队列的连接。Use either or to pull a connection from the incoming connection request queue. 将阻止这两种方法。These two methods will block. 如果你想要避免阻塞，则可以使用方法首先确定连接请求将在队列中可用。If you want to avoid blocking, you can use the method first to determine if connection requests are available in the queue. 调用方法来关闭。Call the method to close the . > [!NOTE] > 方法不会关闭任何已接受的连接。The method does not close any accepted connections. 你负责分别关闭这些连接。You are responsible for closing these separately. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建。The following code example creates a . [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CPP/tcpserver.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CS/tcpserver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/VB/tcpserver.vb#1)] 请参阅对于客户端示例。See for a client example.

permission.span: 若要建立传出连接，或接受传入的请求。

span.span: to establish an outgoing connection or accept an incoming request.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use TcpListener (IPAddress address, int port) instead")
System.Obsolete("This method has been deprecated. Please use TcpListener(IPAddress localaddr, int port) instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

param.name: port
param.span: 用来侦听传入的连接尝试的端口。

span.span: The port on which to listen for incoming connection attempts.

summary.span: 初始化在指定端口上侦听的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that listens on the specified port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数已过时。This constructor is obsolete. 使用或构造函数。Use the or constructors. 此构造函数，可指定要侦听有传入的连接尝试的端口号。This constructor allows you to specify the port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts. 使用此构造函数，基础服务提供程序分配的最合适的网络地址。With this constructor, the underlying service provider assigns the most appropriate network address. 如果你不关心使用哪个本地端口，可以指定的端口号为 0。If you do not care which local port is used, you can specify 0 for the port number. 在这种情况下，服务提供商将分配一个可用的临时端口号。In this case, the service provider will assign an available ephemeral port number. 如果使用此方法，可以发现哪些本地网络地址和端口号，从而使用分配属性。If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the property. 调用方法以开始侦听传入的连接尝试。Call the method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建使用本地端口号。The following code example creates a using a local port number. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#3)]

span.span: An that represents the local endpoint to which to bind the listener .

summary.span: 使用指定的本地终结点初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified local endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数允许您指定的本地 IP 地址和端口号上用来侦听传入的连接尝试。This constructor allows you to specify the local IP address and port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts. 使用此构造函数之前，必须创建使用所需的本地 IP 地址和端口号。Before using this constructor, you must create an using the desired local IP address and port number. 将其传递构造函数、 作为到`localEP`参数。Pass this to the constructor as the `localEP` parameter. 如果您不介意分配的本地地址，则可以创建使用地址参数，以及基础的服务提供程序将分配的最合适的网络地址。If you do not care which local address is assigned, you can create an using as the address parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address. 这可能有助于简化您的应用程序，如果有多个网络接口。This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces. 如果你不关心使用哪个本地端口，可以创建使用 0 作为端口号。If you do not care which local port is used, you can create an using 0 for the port number. 在这种情况下，服务提供商将分配一个可用的临时端口号。In this case, the service provider will assign an available ephemeral port number. 如果使用此方法，可以发现哪些本地网络地址和端口号，从而使用分配属性。If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the property. 调用方法以开始侦听传入的连接尝试。Call the method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类使用的本地终结点。The following code example creates an instance of the class using the local endpoint. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that listens for incoming connection attempts on the specified local IP address and port number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数允许您指定的本地 IP 地址和端口号上用来侦听传入的连接尝试。This constructor allows you to specify the local IP address and port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts. 调用此构造函数之前您必须首先创建使用所需的本地地址。Before calling this constructor you must first create an using the desired local address. 将其传递构造函数、 作为到`localaddr`参数。Pass this to the constructor as the `localaddr` parameter. 如果您不介意分配的本地地址，指定为`localaddr`参数，基础服务提供程序会将分配的最合适的网络地址。If you do not care which local address is assigned, specify for the `localaddr` parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address. 这可能有助于简化您的应用程序，如果有多个网络接口。This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces. 如果你不关心使用哪个本地端口，可以指定的端口号为 0。If you do not care which local port is used, you can specify 0 for the port number. 在这种情况下，服务提供商将分配可用的端口号介于 1024年和 5000 之间。In this case, the service provider will assign an available port number between 1024 and 5000. 如果使用此方法，可以发现哪些本地网络地址和端口号，从而使用分配属性。If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the property. 调用方法以开始侦听传入的连接尝试。Call the method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例类使用本地 IP 地址和端口号。The following code example creates an instance of the class using a local IP address and port number. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Net.Sockets.Socket AcceptSocket() cil managed

summary.span: 接受挂起的连接请求。

span.span: Accepts a pending connection request.

returns.span: 用于发送和接收数据的 。

span.span: A used to send and receive data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是返回一个阻止方法可用于发送和接收数据。 is a blocking method that returns a that you can use to send and receive data. 如果你想要避免阻塞，则使用方法来确定连接请求将传入的连接队列中可用。If you want to avoid blocking, use the method to determine if connection requests are available in the incoming connection queue. 返回初始化与远程主机的 IP 地址和端口号。The returned is initialized with the IP address and port number of the remote host. 可以使用任一并方法中提供类来与远程主机进行通信。You can use any of the and methods available in the class to communicate with the remote host. 完成后使用，则一定要调用其方法。When you are finished using the , be sure to call its method. 如果你的应用程序相对简单，请考虑使用方法而不是方法。If your application is relatively simple, consider using the method rather than the method. 用于发送和接收数据通过网络在阻止同步模式提供了简单的方法。 provides you with simple methods for sending and receiving data over a network in blocking synchronous mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中，方法用于返回。In the following code example, the method is used to return a . 这用于与新连接的客户端进行通信。This is used to communicate with the newly connected client. [!code-cpp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic TcpListener.PublicMethodsAndPropertiesExample/VB/source.vb#4)]

summary.span: 接受挂起的连接请求以作为异步操作。

Returns

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

returns.span: 任务对象上的 属性返回了用于发送和接收数据的 。

span.span: The property on the task object returns a used to send and receive data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回套接字连接已被接受后，将完成对象。The returned object will complete after the socket connection has been accepted. 中返回初始化与远程主机的 IP 地址和端口号。The returned in is initialized with the IP address and port number of the remote host. 可以使用任一并方法中提供类来与远程主机进行通信。You can use any of the and methods available in the class to communicate with the remote host. 完成后使用，则一定要调用其方法。When you are finished using the , be sure to call its method. 如果你的应用程序相对简单，请考虑使用方法而不是方法。If your application is relatively simple, consider using the method rather than the method. 用于发送和接收数据通过网络在阻止同步模式提供了简单的方法。 provides you with simple methods for sending and receiving data over a network in blocking synchronous mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

exception.span: 尚未通过调用 来启动该侦听器。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是返回一个阻止方法可用于发送和接收数据。 is a blocking method that returns a that you can use to send and receive data. 使用方法，以确定是否连接请求将传入的连接队列中可用，是否你想要避免阻塞。Use the method to determine if connection requests are available in the incoming connection queue if you want to avoid blocking. 使用方法来获取基础所返回的。Use the method to obtain the underlying of the returned . 将为您提供方法来发送和接收与远程主机。The will provide you with methods for sending and receiving with the remote host. 如果要通过使用，则一定要调用其方法。When you are through with the , be sure to call its method. 如果想要比更大的灵活性产品/服务，请考虑使用。If you want greater flexibility than a offers, consider using . > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中，方法用于返回。In the following code example, the method is used to return a . 这用于与新连接的客户端进行通信。This is used to communicate with the newly connected client. Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否正主动侦听客户端连接。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether is actively listening for client connections.

value.span: 如果 正主动侦听，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if is actively listening; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自可以使用此属性以确定如果当前正在侦听传入的连接尝试。Classes deriving from can use this property to determine if the is currently listening for incoming connection attempts. 属性可用于避免冗余尝试。The property can be used to avoid redundant attempts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AllowNatTraversal(bool allowed) cil managed

param.name: allowed
param.span: 一个布尔值，该值指定是启用还是禁用 NAT 遍历。

span.span: A Boolean value that specifies whether to enable or disable NAT traversal.

summary.span: 启用或禁用针对 实例的网络地址转换 (NAT) 遍历。

span.span: Enables or disables Network Address Translation (NAT) traversal on a instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于启用或禁用 NAT 遍历实例。The method is used to enable or disable NAT traversal for a instance. 可以使用 Teredo、 6to4、 或的 ISATAP 隧道提供 NAT 遍历。NAT traversal may be provided using Teredo, 6to4, or an ISATAP tunnel. 当`allowed`参数为 false，关联的套接字上的选项设置为。When the `allowed` parameter is false, the option on the associated socket is set to . 这将显式禁用 NAT 遍历实例。This explicitly disables NAT traversal for a instance. 当`allowed`参数为 true，关联的套接字上的选项设置为。When the `allowed` parameter is true, the option on the associated socket is set to . 这可能使 NAT 遍历具体取决于在系统上发生的防火墙规则。This may allow NAT traversal for a depending on firewall rules in place on the system. 必须在调用之前调用方法方法以开始侦听传入连接请求 （之前绑定套接字）。The method must be invoked prior to calling the method to begin listening for incoming connection requests (before the socket is bound). 如果方法之后调用方法，则将引发。If method is called after the method, then an will be thrown. Teredo 地址为 IPv6 地址前缀为 2001年:: / 32。A Teredo address is an IPv6 address with the prefix of 2001::/32. Teredo 地址可以是返回通过正常的 DNS 名称解析或枚举为分配给本地接口的 IPv6 地址。Teredo addresses can be returned through normal DNS name resolution or enumerated as an IPv6 address assigned to a local interface.

exception.span: 在调用 方法之后调用 方法

span.span: The method was called after calling the method

param.name: state

param.span: 操作完成后，此对象会被传递给 callback 委托。

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作来接受一个传入的连接尝试。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步完成操作，必须通过调用方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`callback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止，直到操作完成。This method does not block until the operation completes. 若要阻止在操作完成之前，请使用方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). > [!NOTE] > 您可以调用属性所返回的来标识远程主机的网络地址和端口号。You can call the property of the returned to identify the remote host's network address and port number. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性获取特定的错误代码和参考位于 MSDN library 中的 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/)为详细错误的说明。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/) for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法创建并连接套接字。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to create and connect a socket. 回调委托调用方法来结束异步请求。The callback delegate calls the method to end the asynchronous request. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/cpp/tcpserver.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/CS/tcpserver.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/VB/tcpserver.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指定 是否只允许一个基础套接字来侦听特定端口。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the allows only one underlying socket to listen to a specific port.

value.span: 如果 只允许一个 来侦听特定端口，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the allows only one to listen to a specific port; otherwise, .

value.span: 在 Windows Server 2003、Windows XP Service Pack 2 及更高版本中，默认为 ；在所有其他版本中，默认为 。

span.span: The default is for Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP Service Pack 2 and later, and for all other versions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，多个侦听器可以侦听特定端口。By default, multiple listeners can listen to a specific port. 但是，只有一个侦听器可以执行对发送到端口的网络流量的操作。However, only one of the listeners can perform operations on the network traffic sent to the port. 如果多个侦听器尝试绑定到特定端口，即具有更具体的 IP 地址会处理发送到该端口的网络流量。If more than one listener attempts to bind to a particular port, then the one with the more specific IP address handles the network traffic sent to that port. 可以使用属性可防止多个侦听器侦听特定端口。You can use the property to prevent multiple listeners from listening to a specific port. 设置此属性之前调用，或调用方法，然后设置此属性。Set this property before calling , or call the method and then set this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取和设置属性。The following code example gets and sets the property. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/cpp/tcpserver.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/CS/tcpserver.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/VB/tcpserver.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用属性来标识要用于侦听传入客户端连接请求，套接字连接后的本地网络接口和端口号。You can use the property to identify the local network interface and port number being used to listen for incoming client connection requests, after a socket connection has been made. 必须先转换这到。You must first cast this to an . 然后，可以调用属性来检索本地 IP 地址和属性来检索本地端口号。You can then call the property to retrieve the local IP address, and the property to retrieve the local port number. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示在其上的本地 IP 地址和端口号侦听传入连接请求。The following code example displays the local IP address and port number on which the is listening for incoming connection requests. span.span: if connections are pending; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此非阻止方法确定是否有任何挂起的连接请求。This non-blocking method determines if there are any pending connection requests. 因为并方法阻止执行，直到方法已排队的传入连接请求，方法可以用于确定连接尝试接受这些条款之前是否可用。Because the and methods block execution until the method has queued an incoming connection request, the method can be used to determine if connections are available before attempting to accept them. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查方法。The following code example checks the method. 如果连接请求正在等待被接受，然后调用方法发生。If a connection request is waiting to be accepted, then a call to the method is made. [!code-cpp[TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListener_Pending_LocalEndPoint/VB/source.vb#1)]

The underlying .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建来侦听传入客户端连接请求。 creates a to listen for incoming client connection requests. 类派生自可以使用此属性来获取此。Classes deriving from can use this property to get this . 使用基础返回的以外的属性，如果您需要访问其提供。Use the underlying returned by the property if you require access beyond that which provides. > [!NOTE] > 属性仅返回用于侦听传入客户端连接请求。The property only returns the used to listen for incoming client connection requests. 使用方法以接受挂起的连接请求和获取来发送和接收数据。Use the method to accept a pending connection request and obtain a for sending and receiving data. 此外可以使用方法以接受挂起的连接请求和获取来发送和接收数据。You can also use the method to accept a pending connection request and obtain a for sending and receiving data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 基础检索并选项配置超时在 10 秒后如果数据仍保留在的网络缓冲区后关闭连接。The underlying is retrieved and the option is configured to time out after 10 seconds if data still remains in the network buffer after the connection is closed. [!code-csharp[TcpListenerProtectedMembers1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListenerProtectedMembers1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TcpListenerProtectedMembers1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/TcpListenerProtectedMembers1/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 开始侦听传入的连接请求。

span.span: Starts listening for incoming connection requests.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Start() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 开始侦听传入的连接请求。

span.span: Starts listening for incoming connection requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法初始化基础、 将其绑定到本地终结点，并侦听传入的连接尝试。The method initializes the underlying , binds it to a local endpoint, and listens for incoming connection attempts. 如果收到连接请求时，方法会对请求进行排队，并继续侦听其他请求，直到你调用方法。If a connection request is received, the method will queue the request and continue listening for additional requests until you call the method. 如果接收连接请求在排队的最大连接数后，它会引发客户端上。If receives a connection request after it has already queued the maximum number of connections, it will throw a on the client. 若要从传入的连接队列中删除的连接，使用方法或方法。To remove a connection from the incoming connection queue, use either the method or the method. 方法将从队列删除的连接，并返回可用于发送和接收数据。The method will remove a connection from the queue and return a that you can use to send and receive data. 方法将返回可用于执行相同操作。The method will return a that you can use to do the same. 如果你的应用程序仅需要同步 I/O，请使用。If your application only requires synchronous I/O, use . 有关更多详细行为的控件，使用。For more detailed behavioral control, use . 这两种方法可用之前阻止的连接请求队列中。Both of these methods block until a connection request is available in the queue. 使用方法来关闭和停止侦听。Use the method to close the and stop listening. 你负责分别关闭所接受的连接。You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何用于侦听传入客户端连接尝试。The following code example demonstrates how is used to listen for incoming client connection attempts. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/cpp/tcpserver.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/CS/tcpserver.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/VB/tcpserver.vb#3)]

param.name: backlog
param.span: 挂起连接队列的最大长度。

span.span: The maximum length of the pending connections queue.

summary.span: 启动对具有最大挂起连接数的传入连接请求的侦听。

span.span: Starts listening for incoming connection requests with a maximum number of pending connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法初始化基础、 将其绑定到本地终结点，并侦听传入的连接尝试。The method initializes the underlying , binds it to a local endpoint, and listens for incoming connection attempts. 如果收到连接请求时，将对请求进行排队并继续侦听其他请求，直到你调用方法。If a connection request is received, will queue the request and continue listening for additional requests until you call the method. 如果接收连接请求之后它已排入队列的最大数的连接，将引发,客户端上。If receives a connection request after it has already queued the maximum number of connections it will throw a on the client. 若要从传入的连接队列中删除的连接，使用方法或方法。To remove a connection from the incoming connection queue, use either the method or the method. 方法将从队列删除的连接，并返回可用于发送和接收数据。The method will remove a connection from the queue and return a that you can use to send and receive data. 方法将返回可用于执行相同操作。The method will return a that you can use to do the same. 如果你的应用程序仅需要同步 I/O，请使用。If your application only requires synchronous I/O, use the . 有关更多详细行为的控件，使用方法。For more detailed behavioral control, use method. 这两种方法可用之前阻止的连接请求队列中。Both of these methods block until a connection request is available in the queue. 使用方法来关闭和停止侦听。Use the method to close the and stop listening. 你负责分别关闭所接受的连接。You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately. > [!NOTE] > 使用属性获取特定的错误代码和参考位于 MSDN library 中的 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/)有关错误的详细说明。Use the property to obtain the specific error code and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/) for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何用于侦听传入客户端连接尝试。The following code example demonstrates how is used to listen for incoming client connection attempts. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/cpp/tcpserver.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/CS/tcpserver.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener1/VB/tcpserver.vb#3)]

exception.span: 访问套接字时出错。

span.span: An error occurred while accessing the socket.

exception.span: 参数小于零或超出允许的最大连接数。

span.span: The parameter is less than zero or exceeds the maximum number of permitted connections.

exception.span: 基础 为空。

span.span: The underlying is null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭侦听器。

span.span: Closes the listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭侦听器。 closes the listener. 在队列中的任何未接受的连接请求都将丢失。Any unaccepted connection requests in the queue will be lost. 远程主机连接正在等待接受将引发。Remote hosts waiting for a connection to be accepted will throw a . 你负责分别关闭所接受的连接。You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用方法来关闭基础。The following code example demonstrates using the method to close the underlying . [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CPP/tcpserver.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/CS/tcpserver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener/VB/tcpserver.vb#1)]

exception.span: 使用 属性获取指定的错误代码。

span.span: Use the property to obtain the specific error code.

exception.span: 获取此代码后，可以参考 Windows Sockets 版本 2 API 错误代码文档，获取有关错误的详细说明。

span.span: When you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation for a detailed description of the error.

para.span: 方法也会关闭基础，并创建一个新为。

span.span: The method also closes the underlying , and creates a new for the .

para.span: 如果将任何属性设置对基础之前调用方法，这些属性将不会延续到新。

span.span: If you set any properties on the underlying prior to calling the method, those properties will not carry over to the new .
